english.segment1: Lord are You still coming?. This world is all in shame. Everything is broken. But You remain
english.segment2: Have mercy on me, Jesus. I can't take one more step. The lights go out all around me
english.segment3: I want to see Your face. I want to hear Your voice. I want to lay my burden down. I want to run to You. Forever dance with You. I long for night to end. Lord let Your day begin
english.segment4: The sons of men are hiding. Pretending to be free. They're yearing to escape You. For liberty
english.segment5: But I want to see Your face. I want to hear Your voice. I want to lay my burden down. I want to run to You. Forever dance with You. I long for night to end. Lord let Your day begin. Let it come, Lord
english.segment6: All I want, Lord Jesus. Only You can give. When the light goes out all around me
